'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A large empty expanse of ocean in the northeastern-most corner of the Deadfire, with little to no landmarks or distinguishing features. The ocean gets its name from the storms of [[Ondra's Mortar]] further to the north, but is itself far less deadly - save for a few pirates roaming the area.
